comm: gentle outswinger to begin outside the off stump. Rohit thinks of playing it before withdrawing his bat
some more swing away from Rohit. On a fuller length and moving towards a sixth-stump line, Rohit times his drive beautifully but straight to cover
pulls his length back immediately. On a good length with the same gentle outswing, Rohit flirts at the ball and is beaten
a bit too wide from Steyn this time, too full and too wide but Rohit is happy to leave
again wider outside off, Rohit watches the swing carefully and shoulders arms.

nicely played, pushed wider outside off and Rohit pushes a drive through cover, AB runs around swiftky from mid-off and fires a throw at the non-strikers end. Would have been interesting with a direct hit
back of a length on middle and off, Rohit plays it watchfully with soft hands towards square leg. Dhawan sets off thinking a single is there on offer and is sent back in time
delectable timing there. Just leans on a drive and pushes the fuller length through cover. Lightning outfield but AB pulls it back
good length there. Slightly fuller than a good length outside off, Rohit leaves

cleaned im up. What a strike. What an important strike that is. Too full and Rohit is slightly late on the flick. He is beaten for pace as the ball clips his pads and takes the off stump out. Huge wicket for SA.
a bit too full again outside off, Rahane drives to cover with not much feet movement
better stride this time from Rahane. Fuller length towards off stump, Rahane plays a good-looking on drive to mid-on
excellent delivery, back of a length, hitting the deck hard. Dhawan fends it off awkwardly but the ball lands short of point

hmm, not a great run there. Good length on off, Dhawan plays it with soft hands towards cover and calls for the run. Rahane responds immediately and makes a full-length dive too but would have still been interesting with a direct-hit
good length, not much swing now. Well outside off though and Rahane gets a good stride forward and leaves
almost a repeat. Just a bit shorter and wide, would have been cut under different circumstances but Rahane watchfully lets it go
good stride again, fuller from Steyn, zoning in on that off stump line. Rahane presents the full face of the bat to block
good length outside off, Rahane puts in a giant front-foot stride to shoulder his arms.
just a little bit of inswing, Good length swinging back in from outside off. Dhawan looks to play his trademark punchy square drive but the movement takes the inside edge to square leg
what a shot! You may not see a better cover drive. Not that full from Rabada but a tad too wide, Dhawan stays in his crease and creams the drive through extra cover
better comeback. Back of a length on middle, Dhawan pats the ball to mid-on
did that keep low or was Dhawan a bit too late on it? Fullish and wide, Dhawan is beaten on his attempted drive
nicely bowled again, swinging in on a fullish length but aimed at off and middle, Dhawan plays the ball with the swing to mid-on
huge appeal, not given. A bit too much doubt maybe. Good length on middle, swinging in and striking Dhawan slightly high in front of middle and leg
off the mark in a rather stylish method. Full again and swinging away from Rahane who throws his hands at it and gets the ball well over cover. Not much feet movement
Steyn immediately corrects himself. Back of a length and closer to off, Rahane prods at it defensively with no feet movement and is comprehensively beaten.
and again, swinging away from Rahane, just inside that tramline. Rahane looks to cut again but the technique is not there, minimal feet movement and is beaten again
its either hit or miss at the moment. And this was hit, smashed away in the air over cover again. Just a tad wide and he did not bother keeping that down
better stroke, more confident shot. Steyn corrects that line by bringing the ball closer to middle, and that isn't the line to this man. Rahane easily flicks off his pads through midwicket
probling delivery towards off and middle, Rahane looks to find that gap again but clips it in the air, but lands short of mid-on
excellent variation. A well-directed bouncer! Aimed at Dhawan's badge, who sways out of the line in time
ominous signs these. Excellently driven but straight to extra cover, a bit too full there was Rabada
drags back his length a touch, good length and outside off. Dhawan stands in his crease and punches the drive to extra cover again
attempted yorker and it is well-executed. But a bit too wide outside off, Dhawan digs the yorker out to point
and another! Good stuff this. Hustling Dhawan for pace too. But this one is aimed at off and middle, Dhawan gets his feet out of the way and squeezes the ball to cover
overpitched now on middle, Dhawan drives nicely but hits it back straight at the bowler.
poor lines, short and wide. Rahane throws his hands at it again but is beaten by the bounce this time. Not bothering to keep these shots down. Not bad shot selection to be honest
more respectfully played by Rahane, but a much better delivery by Morkel. Good length on off which is defended into the off side
important stroke that. We have not seen enough of that so far. Rahane just opens the face of the bat and dabs the ball to third man
143.7 kph, hitting the deck hard. Back of  a length outside off, Dhawan plays the ball with sift hands towards point but there is no single there
good pacey stuff from Morkel. Nice lines too. Dhawan watchfully defends to the off side
missed opportunity there. Drifts on Dhawan's pads who looks to flick but is struck above the knee roll. They will get a leg bye
again strays in line to the right-hander. Rahane leaves the ball as the ball drifts down leg
slower delivery, 126 kph, may have been cross-seam too with the objective to finish off the over. Rahane gets forward and blocks
slightly shorter but wide and Dhawan chops his cut to point. Have to put these opportunities away
141 kph, full and drifting on Dhawan's pads who is beaten on his attempted flick. the ball rolls to slip off his pads
fullish length but angled across the left-hander. Dhawan thinks of flashing at that but eventually lets the ball go through to de Kock
beats the fielder and that is four. This was too full and too wide and this opportunity is punished. Dhawan creams the drive through cover, past a diving AB at mid-off
much much better from Dhawan. Not a bad ball at all, good length outside off, Dhawan bunts the ball to AB at mid-off and calls immediately. They get it easily
another single. Good stuff now from the pair. Fuller than a good length on middle, Rahane works the ball towards midwicket and there is an easy single to be had
good shot selection from Rahane. Keeping a tall Morkel down is arduously hard and therefore he chooses the safer option and goes over cover. Just a bit too short there
fuller than a good length from Morkel but is too wide, may have been an offcutter. Rahane cuts nicely but to point.
again wide, the length is full though and Rahane steers the ball to third man off the open face
slower offcutter again at 128 ks, Dhawan is early into the flick but lands a few metres in front of square leg
concerted effort not to offer Dhawan room outside off, tucking him for the length he wants. Dhawan can only clip the leg side-ish delivery to square leg
excellent shot, very clever thinking too. With AB at a wide mid-off, all he needed to do was play a routine drive through mid-off and he executed nicely.
drifting down leg and the appeal is withdrawn before it gets loud. Good length and Rahane misses out on some runs through leg
wristily done but straight to square leg. A very Tendulkar-esque shot that. Works the ball from off to the man at square leg
good-looking drive, Rahane pushes the fuller length to cover
inconsistent lines but the margin of difference is not a lot on these balls. Good length on off and Rahane stands tall and works the ball to square leg
the line is similar but its the difference in length that makes the shot possible. Short and sits up for Rahane to swivel-pull through backward square leg
another nice shot. Back of a length, climbing on Rahane who arches his back and runs the ball down to third man to keep strike
better from Morkel. Reverting back to his usual back of a length, splice-jarring. Rahane watchfully defends off the back foot
well played from Rahane. Morkel sticks to that length, maybe a tad shorter also. Rahane sways out of the line and checks his pull to fine leg. Kept his eyes on the ball as he controlled that shot
short and wide, cut out to third man
runs another one down to third man off the back foot
151.7 kph, extremely quick stuff here from Morkel. Dhawan is late on the drive but gets it out to mid-on
138 kph now. Back of a length on leg and Dhawan nudges the ball off his hips to fine leg
loosener, short outside off, rank long-hop. Dahwan rocks back early and pulls uppishly but over midwicket for four
full toss now outside off, Dhawan remains calm as he drives to long-off for one
another full toss, this one much lower. Rahane drives to long-on
lands it nicely this time, no spin. Dhawan chops this back onto his pads from outside off
too short and wide, Dhawan cuts out to sweeper cover

excellent fielding to follow an excellent shot. Too short from JP, Rahane hangs back and punches a drive past cover. Behardien at sweeper cover never gives up, even on this outfield and hauls it back in. Sensational stuff
144 ks, short again, aimed at Dhawan's ribs, he looks to pull but the ball hurries onto him as he can only gove it down to fine leg
Morkel persists with that back of  a length, Rahane sticks to his steer to third man

soft dismissal. Loss in concentration there. Slower offcutter outside off, Dhawan just chips the ball to short cover. JP Duminy is surprised as he takes it. But that was a deceitful change in pace from Morkel. After all that pace, he goes slower and full which results in Dhawan going through the stroke much earlier
142 ks, hits the deck hard outside off, Kohli sways out of the line and lets the ball go.
fuller length now outside off, Kohli gets a front foot stride and prods at the ball with soft hands. The ball rolls off the outside edge to second slip
good length again, just that line where Kohli has found so much trouble in the past. He stays on the back foot and guides this to point
shorter delivery, spinning into Rahane who rocks back and drills to long-on. Easy single
overpitched now outside the off stump. Kohli plays a nice on-drive to long-on to get off the mark
82 ks, short and wide, poor stuff this from JP. Has not settled into any kind of troublesome length yet. Rahane uppishly cuts to the sweeper
fuller length on off, Virat works the ball with the spin to deep midwicket
midwicket gets around to cut this one off. Fuller and clipped to that man
slower and full, better stuff from Duminy. Rahane opens the face of the bat to get the ball wide of third man, towards point
lands it perfectly on off, Rahane gets forward to block
too short now, Rahane smashes a pull to deep midwicket
nudged off his pads towards deep midwicket
leg side-ish again, Rahane works the ball to deep square leg off his pads
much slower through the air, and extracts some spin too. Kohli hangs back and defends to the bowler
bottom-handed power there from Kohli. Too full and muscled to long-on with those hands
good length on a fifth-stump line. Kohli gets behind the line of the ball and defends with a lot of intent to cover
nice shot and he forces the second with some terrific running. He works the ball past point and runs the first hard, and Tahir at third man fumbles. and back they com
solidly blocked off the back foot, 144 ks.
nice drive but straight to cover. Not much feet movement though, he could have got so much more forward to that
drives again through cover with no feet movement. Not a greats hot. It was full too, but slightly wide and Kohli checks his push
137.7 ks, full and a fifth-stump line, Rahane drives nicely again but hits the fielder again
bit of flight on the pads, he tucks it away to deep midwicket for one
shorter and flatter just outside off, he pushes it back
flattish on off stump again, Kohli goes back to help it to long on
lunges forward and defends the fuller delivery into the covers
even fuller on off and middle, flicked down to long on for one
full toss is also pushed down to long on for one
pretty straight delivery from Steyn with a scrambled seam and Kohli pushes it with a full face to mid-on for one
fullish on the pads, Rahane looks to flick and misses. Takes it on the pad
slightly straighter on middle, Rahane flicks this time in the gap between deep square leg and fine leg for two
angling in a bit from outside off, Rahane angles the bat late and guides it to third man for one
fullish outside off, driven down nicely to mid-off for one

dropped at mid-off but there's a run out, what a horrible mix up, the two batsmen end up at non-striker's end! Kohli is out and he's absolutely livid! Rahane drove the ball down uppishly and in the air, Behardien leapt in the air and got both hands but it was a tough chance and it went down. The batsmen watch that and take one, then Kohli sprints back for the second while Rahane holds his hand up to say no but Kohli wants the run. Both are at the same end and the bails are taken off by the keeper. Kohli did make it on time and he was running to the danger end so looks like there was a run there
fullish on the stumps, pushed on the leg side
on the pads a little bit and it's tucked to the leg side for one
full and outside off, driven down easily to long-off
full and a bit wide, driven straight to cover by Rahane
flighted and full on middle stump, Rahane drives it nicely to long on
he comes down the track to negate the turn and pushes it back. Tahir misfields so they sneak in a run
starts with back of length on the pads, deflected towards backward square leg for one
pretty full outside off, driven straight to cover off the front foot
bit slower and on length outside off, driven to sweeper cover for one
short of length outside off and Dhoni nudges it towards deep point in the gap for two
much straighter on middle and leg, Dhoni defends it back
bit too full outside off, Dhoni connects the drive but finds cover
fullish on the pads, flicked nicely to deep square leg for one
comes down for the straight ball and tucks to square leg, he looks at Rahane who responds for the quick single
lunges forward and defends the ball towards point
full and flighted on middle, clipped straight to midwicket
turns the googly in from off stump, Rahane helps it to midwicket and is sent back for the single
on middle and leg, Rahane falls back this time and helps it to fine leg for one
starts with a slightly slower one at 123kph outside off, Rahane chops it to third man
shuffles across to the off side and taps the ball with the angle behind square on the leg side, and he runs like a 20-year old for two
wider outside off now and he punches it to sweeper cover for one

he's ramped that right over the keeper, in fact it's gone to the leg side and that's a fifty for Rahane! The short ball was coming in with the angle, and he ramped it up and over so late that it went to the on side
just short of length outside off, defends it to point for one
124kph, slower outside off and full, he blocks it towards point and there's no run
comes down again and pushes the ball to midwicket
uses his feet again and pushes the fuller ball to long-on for one
full on the stumps now, clipped to midwicket

he's bowled him round the legs! Tahir has taken off and Rahane can't believe it, he's still on the crease and is asking the umpires now. The umpires refer it to the third umpire. Rahane was sweeping the ball which pitched outside leg, but he misses and the ball turned just enough to clip the leg stump
stays back and helps the ball with the turn to leg
unleashes the googly and Raina presses forward to block it back
he bowls the short one around off and Dhoni hops back to defend it softly to leg for a quick one
shuffles across towards off, but it does down leg and is called a wide. Morkel has his hands on the head because it was close to leg stump
this one goes just over the stumps! Raina shuffled across again, expecting the short ball to help it to fine leg, and missed again
just short of length outside off, it's defended into the covers

he's caught down the leg side, it was a short ball after all! Raina kept shuffling towards the off side, Morkel kept bowling them short and this time Raina was strangled down the leg side and even got a faint edge and QDK takes a good diving catch. The umpires check for a no ball and it's fine, Raina walks back
short ball with some angle, Axar misses the defence and takes it on the body
back of length now on the body again, tucked to backward square leg easily to get off the mark
drifts it in a bit around off, Axar lunges forward to defend and it takes the outside edge
pushes forward to defend the turning ball to the off side
slightly full on off and he pushes it back to Tahir
slightly slower through the air on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket
single off the last ball as it's pitched outside off and Axar drives it down to long off
length delivery around the off stump, defends it into the covers
run-out chance! Axar tucked the ball off the pads to backward square leg and takes off for one, MSD says no but Axar is a bit lazy to come back. Had it been a direct hit, Axar was out
slightly short on leg, pulled straight to backward square leg again
outside off now and he drives on the up for a thick edge to third man
short ball angled in, hal-pulled to the leg side tentatively
towards the leg side now and Dhoni cashes in by pulling it late, it goes fine and fine enough to go for four. Something to cheer about for the crowd
84kph, pretty straight on middle and leg, Axar defends to leg
fuller on the pads and it's driven down to long on for one
comes forward a bit and tucks the ball from off to midwicket
short and flat around off, Dhoni goes back and punches it to long on
pretty flat towards the off stump from round the wicket, Axar defends it back
fuller and towards leg, driven down to long-on for one
just outside off and inside edge hits Axar's back pad
on the pads now, clipped to the leg side but straight to the fielder
short ball, he pulls and misses. Didn't time the shot properly and took it on the body, near the abdomen
pretty full outside off, Axar drives nicely to mid-off off the front foot
cramps him up for room by pitching it on middle and leg, Axar defends it back
slightly slower and short of length outside off, Axar pushes it towards mid-off for one
fullish on the stumps and driven down firmly, JPD dives to his left to get a hand to it
bit of flight outside off, driven wider of the bowler now to long-off
turns it in from outside off, Dhoni stays back and defends it to the bowler
on middle stump, Axar puts his front foot forward and defends it to midwicket

bit full outside off and Axar has lofted it in the air with an inside-out drive, don't think he middled that but it has enough power and falls wide of the long off fielder. That's gone all the way actually, six runs!
beaten outside off! What a teasing line that was outside off, Dhoni played just inside the line of the ball as it beat his drive
towards the pads now and it's helped to fine leg for one

loud appeal for lbw and Steyn pumps his fists as the finger goes up! Slightly back of length ball on leg stump, it was headed towards the leg stump as Axar tried to clip it to leg but was trapped on the back foot. Looks like it pitched right on the leg stump line, not outside, and Aleem Dar was the umpire not Kulkarni if you were wondering. Axar was a bit on his toes and the ball hit him just above the knee roll
goes towards the off side a bit as the ball goes down leg for a wide
back of length outside off ad it's pushed to mid-off
on length outside off and Bhuvi defends it into the covers
short ball at 140.7kph to end the over outside off and Bhuvi sways out of the line to let it go
comes down the track to whip it to leg and takes it on the pad
fuller delivery now and it's easily pushed down to long-on for one
goes back and punches the shorter ball back to JPD
much wider outside off, Bhuvi goes back and pushes the ball to cover
lunges forward this time and defends it solidly with the bat close to his pad
not much turn outside off and Bhuvi defends it back from deep in the crease
angled into the pads, Dhoni helps the ball to backward square leg
on the middle stump now, Dhoni waits for it and defends it to mid-on
outside off and Dhoni times that square drive really well to beat backward point by a fraction of a second and gets two
loud cheers again as Dhoni tucks the shortish ball towards fine leg. Rabada runs to his left and slides and the ball deflects off him towards the boudnary but he cuts it in on second attempt
another short one, this goes down leg for a wide
angled in a bit and Dhoni pushes it towards midwicket for one
offcutter from off stump to middle and Bhuvi defends it back to Steyn, he's not off the mark yet
Duminy sees MS advancing and fires it on his pads, Dhoni improvises well and nurdles the ball to midwicket
slower through the air on middle, BK pats the ball to midwicket
slightly shorter outside off giving BK enough time to go back and pull to long-on
again feigns the advance but stays in his crease, Duminy fires it quick and outside off, de Kock whips off the bails but never left the crease
worked with the spin to midwicket
and Dhoni pushes the nothing delivery to midwicket again
BK is no position to play that, he moves away and pushes the length delivery to mid-off with no feet movement
130 ks, probing stuff. Full and straight from that height is always going to pose problems, to any one. Bhuvneshwar takes his feet out of the line and defends to the leg side
good short one, Morkel varying his deliveries with lots of success. This time, BK gets under it and lets the ball go
is there a bit of reverse swing now? Full and coming back in from outside off, Bhuvneshwar gets a good stride forward and leaves with lots of intent
nicely tickled off his pads to fine leg
overpitched this time on middle, MS goes back in his crease and just pushes the ball past the non-striker. Mid-on is very wide, almost like in  a Test. They get back for the second
slowly tossed up outside off which is squeezed to midwicket
shorter this time, worked out to square leg. BK wants a single but Dhoni sends him back
short on off and swivel-pulled to deep midwicket
fired in short outside off, JP knows that a tossed-up delivery could be met with Dhoni's full flourish. He misses this
short again, pushed to square leg with the turn
fired in once more on leg, patted to midwicket
fuller and tamely driven back to the bowler
Bhuvneshwar squirts out the fuller length for a single to long-on
shorter again to middle, no flight to MS. He cuts to point
quick legspinner on off, muscled to long-off off the back foot
nice flight to Bhuvneshwar on off, not much turn on offer. Worked away to deep square leg
better over for India. Nudged with soft hands to short midwicket and Dhoni is quick to call Bhuvneshwar through for a single
fired in on leg stump, nudged with the spin towards square leg

and that is four. Much needed boundary and is met by raucous cheers from the crowd too. Too full on off, BK moves across and sweeps the ball past short fine leg for four, through the gap at backward square
turned away with the spin to short fine leg
fired in outside off one more, Dhoni misses his cut again. De Kock whips off the bails again. And not out again
fired in down leg, called wide
this time Dhoni out-thinks Duminy. He feigns his advance, Duminy fires it in on leg and MS is waiting for that as he lofts the ball well over square leg. Massive six too
punched off the back foot  to the cover who is on the edge of the circle
slightly short again, and BK stays back and drives the ball to long-on
overpitched on off, Dhoni skips down the track and pushes the ball to long-off for one
more intent from Bhuvneshwar. Smashes the ball to long-off off the front foot
trademark work off the pads by Dhoni. Comes down the track and smothers the spin with a nudge to square leg
too full on off and BK squeezes the ball out to the bowler
a little bit of flight and pushed into the off side
back of a length on middle, Dhoni goes back and tickles the ball to square leg
short delivery outside off, Buvneshwar can only lob the ball in the air straight up. Three fielders converge and let the ball drop. The benefits of a free hit
slower offcutter outside off, cut to point.
quicker delivery now, fuller length but Dhoni hangs back and chops down on the delivery late to point
short ball down leg and called wide.
good length again close to off stump at 138 ks. Dhoni stays back and punches the ball to the gap through cover for a single
140 kph, full and angling in on leg, Bhuvneshwar inside-edges the ball to fine leg
back of a length again, these bowlers are making a concerted effort not to bowl anything in Dhoni's half. He just bunts the ball by his feet and looks for one but Bhuvneshwar says there is no run
short and wide outside off, cut to point
much straighter now. Kumar stays back and works the ball to midwicket

and he has got him this time. Just a little slower through the air and Kumar looks to drive through long-off anticipating some legspin but this one doesn't spin. There is however, a huge gap between bat and pad and the delivery sneaks through and clips leg stump.
googly again to begin to Harbhajan, but this one is wide outside off. Driven back to the bowler
slightly quicker on leg stump, Harbhajan gets a bit of bat on it as the ball rolls away to backward square
overpitched on off which is met by the full face of Harbhajan's bat
nicely played by Dhoni. Too short but well-directed but with square leg in the circle, it wasn't an excellent choice. Dhoni walks across and pulls over that man at  square leg for four
back of a length on middle and leg, Dhoni jumps in his crease but plays the ball to midwicket
too wide this time and Dhoni makes him pay. He hangs back, well inisde his crease and crunches the cut past point
and another loose delivery. Short and wide, Dhoni cuts again but this time, goes straight to point. Missed opportunity again
139.5 ks, good length on middle and leg, not a great over this so far. Dhoni shuffles across and tries to get some bat on that but hits his arm and then through to de Kock

fuller than a good length which maybe deceives Dhoni who was staying back in his crease, expecting a shorter length. The ball pings off his body into the off side. Harbhajan thinks there is one but is sent back by the captain
good length on middle, that splice-jarring length. Harbhajan lobs the ball back to Morkel but it lands well short of him
pushes Harbhajan back in the crease again. Good length on leg, Harbhajan can only clip the ball to square leg
wow, massive heave and why not? Fuller from Morkel and Harbhajan swings at it, it goes off the inside half of the bat to deep midwicket just as the bat turned in his hands
Dhoni has now realised the length being bowled to him. He shuffles across and helps the short ball down to fine leg
may have been the slower one, and Harbhajan is through the shot much too quickly and hits Harbhajan on the arm as he completes the shot before the ball gets to him
follows-it up with another short delivery on off stump. Harbhajan just cannot connect. Swings at the ball again and comprehensively misses
whew. what power. Just plain muscular prowess. Short again from Duminy and Dhoni was waiting for that. He muscles the ball well over long-on. What a shot
oooh, he shapes up for another big shot but the ball dips on him late and he improvises well to keep the eventual yorker out
short and wide, Dhoni pushes the ball towards point and wants two, but there is only one

Harbhajan gets into the action now and the crowd is on its feet, having found their voice. Clouted out to deep midwicket and the ball falls just short of the fielder, it hits him and beats him for four
oh he has connected with that, alright. No question about it. Tossed up on off from JP and Harbhajan clears one foot and launches a huge six over midwicket. That was just huge.
shorter again and no spin, Harbhajan wants to send a message by playing a forward defense but the ball beats him.
short and wide, pushed out to the sweeper cover off the back foot
extra bounce there. Harbhajan wants to cut over point but Morkel's height and bounce takes the ball past Harbhajan's flashing cut
good length again on off, Harbhajan clears one foot and muscles the ball down past mid-off . There is a misfield but they get only one
not a wide there and rightly so. Dhoni walks well across his stumps trying to tickle the ball to fine leg but the ball misses that leg stump
very similar line and length. But this time, the ball meets Dhoni's pads before rolling off to square leg. Morkel is the only one appealing
overpitched outside off and Harbhajan plays a good-looking drive through the vacant cover region. Dhoni slips and therefore just the one
pushed through outside off which is just pushed to cover, Harbhajan lazily jogs through but doesn't realise AB is lurking. He gets his wheels on but the throw isn't accurate
nicely played by Dhoni. Flat and quick on leg, Dhoni just tickles the ball down to fine leg where no one is present.
googly down the leg side, huge wide
he wants two immediately and gets it. He plays the topspinner with soft hands towards square leg and hustles back for the second
smashed. All muscle again. Massive six. He gets to the pitch of the ball, gets under the ball and powers the ball over long-on for a huge six
flatter on off, pushed to cover for one
slower through the air this time outside off, Harbhajan plays it with soft hands towards point after opening the face of the bat.
flat-batted off the back foot to cover. Interesting shot that but not a bad choice. The sweeper cover comes across and fields though
full and wide at 138 ks, Dhoni uses the pace and cuts the ball to point.
slower delivery on leg, Dhoni jumps back in his crease while playing the shot and works the ball to midwicket
short on middle, Harbhajan clears his front foot and swipes at the ball but the ball goes along the ground to deep midwicket
lovely line that with any field. tight on off and Dhoni gets bat on that to point

lands safely. Huge hit attempted by Harbhajan. Full on off and Harbhajan looks to go straight but the ball skews off the outer half of the bat straight in the air but lands behind point. Just the one however
shorter length outside off. Good choice. Harbhajan swings at that but misses again
makes connection here. Slower delivery outside off, Harbhajan goes back and looks to smash the ball over cover and executes nicely

short and extremely sweet from Harbhajan. Good cameo that, but Dhoni will have to farm the strike now. Full outside off, harbhajan swipes at that and gets a thick outside edge which flies to de Kock who clings onto a sharp chance to his right.
back of a length on middle and with that length the top of the bat is in trouble. Hits that area of the bat before going back towards Steyn
Yadav takes Steyn on and crashes the short length through midwicket. Made a good sound as it left the bat

139 ks, and what a catch from de Kock. Only reflex. Yadav chooses a decent shot but doesn't execute well enough in a game of fine margins. Back of a length and Yadav looks to steer the ball to third man with the pace. But the ball goes too fine, de Kock dives to his right and takes a stunning catch. Excellently held.
fired in quick and full on the left-handers tramline. Massive wide
124 ks, fullish delivery and driven to deep cover and Dhoni does refuse the single.
141.1 ks, full outside off, smashed to mid-off. Only twos or boundaries now
147.7 ks, good length now zoning in on off, defended to point

given six. Great shot from Dhoni. Fullish outside off, and Dhoni chooses his shot really well and the execution is terrific. Launches that well over mid-off. Aleem Dar signals six but that one bounced a foot inside the boundary. And the correction is eventually made.
drifting down leg and another wide
fuller length on middle, blocked back down the track

and Dhoni knows exactly what he is doing as he steals a single off the final ball of the over. Overpitched on middle, a little bit fuller and that would have been a yorker but Dhoni digs the ball out to mid-on and scampers one
shorter length on off, Dhoni heaves the ball to long-on and he refuses the single again
smears the ball over cover for four. Excellent shot selection but this length is a bit too predictable with the field. Shorter length outside off and just clears mid-off, goes to the boundary
good length now and Dhoni plays the ball to mid-on. No run again
one-bounce boundary. Attempted bouncer aimed at Dhoni's badge but that one doesn't get up high enough. Dhoni pulls the ball uppishly over square leg for four. Easy four
takes the one this time. Fuller than a good length and Dhoni gets bat on it as he pushes the ball to cover for one
ah, what a block. Gets behind the line nicely and solidly defends back to Steyn
he goes for that, gives himself room but Rabada follows him and Dhoni can only find midwicket with an ill-timed slog
falls just short of Morkel at midwicket. Shorter delivery on leg.
excellent variation. Terrific variation. Dhoni was waiting for the shorter one but Rabada fires a quick yorker outside off. He gets hit on the pads outside off
smashed down to long-on, no run again
terrific short ball. Dhoni decides against hitting that. Not called wide

finally, connects well enough with one. Short again on middle and leg but Dhoni is outside leg, waiting for that. He swings at that and smashes that flat and far. Beats midwicket and destroys a board behind the boundary rope. If any shot had a message to send, that was it.
gentle away swing on a good length, Amla gets behind the line and pushes to cover
Amla is excellent at this, the benefits of experience. He plays the swing late and guides the ball to third man. Just gentle away movement for BK
poor lines, swinging into the left-hander who just picks the ball off his pads to square leg. Easy pickings
better comeback. Fuller length outside off which is met by the full face of the bat as he defends
pulls his length back a tad aiming for the off stump, de Kock plays this to cover off the back foot. Solid defense
swinging into de Kock's pads again who flicks to midwicket
Amla will get four of those now. Full and wide and he plays an exotic cover drive with minimal feet movement. Thick edge flies past second slip and to the boundary.
short now on middle, Amla has plenty of time to hang back, roll his wrists over the pull to keep it down to to fine leg
beaten. Decent pace here. Angled across the left-hander who prods defensively and is beaten
good length on a fourth-stump line which is met with a solid block-push to mid-off
142.8 ks, tried to hit that too hard did de Kock. Overpitched outside off an de Kock smashes it to cover
that was better. Offered a bigger portion of the bat to the ball and pushed it to the right of mid-off for a quick single
lazy stuff from India so far. A bit of width outside off and de Kock lays into that cut, Axar at point fumbles and gives the single
strays on Amla's pads this time who is late on his flick. Bowl there at your peril. Extremely dangerous line
good length now but a but too leg side-ish, clipped off his hips to fine leg
more poor bowling from BK. Overpitched on middle and de Kock flicks this one nicely into the gap through midwicket.
136 ks better length but the line is still a bit too straight. Tapped to mid-on and they get the single
134 ks, full on off which is met with a forward defensive stroke to mid-on

would have been a blinder. Pinged off the middle of the bat and Rohit made a full-length dive to his right and almost hung on. In fact, he did hang on but the ball popped out as he hit the ground. Full-blooded pull to square leg and Rohit almost made a wicket.
this one is better, de Kock just leans on the drive and pushes the ball through mid-off for four
this one squares him up but he still finds the gap through cover. Good length and good pace
straighter on this occasion and de Kock clips the ball off his hips to the left of mid-on for one
nice timing but not placed well enough. Good length outside off, Amla stays back and punches a drive to mid-on
terrific timing. Just leant on that flick and found the gap through midwicket for four. Poor lines these, drifting on Amla's pads is not the wisest thing to do
good length, probing away at off stump. De kock pushes to mid-on
punchily driven off the back foot  to mid-on. Just have to keep the runs down and force a wicket here
better lines. coming in from outside off, de Kock looks to drive but the ball takes the inner half of the bat due to the swing

poor fielding from Harbhajan. India need to stop these. Good length on off and de Kock drives to mid-on, Harbhajan gets around and tries to keep it in but the ball strikes his thigh and rolls away towards the boundary
much much better there. Fullish length on off and Amla blocks
punch-driven to mid-off off the front foot.
hint of turn for length ball outside off, pushed into the covers
slightly slower outside off, QDK waits and cuts it late to backward point
fuller outside off and it's driven with the turn to long-off
tossed up on off stump, flicked to deep midwicket for one
flighted on off stump, driven down with a straight bat to long-off
bit flatter on off and middle, clipped off the back foot to deep midwicket
that's a slider headed for the off stump, Amla defends it back
charges down the track and lofts it by taking it on the full over mid-on for four
stays in the crease now and defends into the covers

he tries to whack him over the in field again and he's gone! The ball didn't come in with the angle after pitching outside off, Amla danced down and heaved but the ball turned a wee bit away and beat him completely. Dhoni takes the bails off so quickly in slow motion too
length delivery around off stump, pushed to leg with an edge
Faf misses the ball that's coming in with the angle, there's a loud appeal but it was going down leg
QDK goes on the back foot to tuck the ball to midwicket where Rohit stops it
comes down nicely and pushes the ball to long-on for one
QDK drives uppishly outside off, thick edge flies and lands well short of backward point
towards the pads now and he clips it to square leg for one
QDK waits and tucks the ball from off towards midwicket with the turn
this one turns in from otuside off and QDK pushes towards extra cover
too short this time and QDK rocks back by making room and cuts it away past backward point for a four
towards off, QDK stays in the crease and defends to leg
comes down and pushes the ball back to Axar, he catches it and throws it to MSD
waits for the ball and helps it down to long-on for one
he dances down and lofts the ball on the full and against the turn to the midwicket boundary with a one-bounce four. Nicely placed in the gap
presses forward now and defends the length delivery

makes room and picks the fielder at long-off, Indore erupts! It was pitched up just outside off with some flight, he went towards leg and lofted it high and straight to Mohit for a simple catch which he had to come forward for
tossed up outside off with some turn, left alone
too short from Harbhajan this time and JP rocks on the back foot to punch it through the covers for four
on length now outside off, turns away and JP lets it go
taregts the off stump from around the wicket and Faf defends it back
lunges forward this time and defends into the covers
towards the pads now and it's helped to leg for one
presses forward and defends the length ball back
takes a step down and whips it with the turn to long-on
comes down to drive the ball with the turn, but it doesn't turn as much and the edge rolls back to Axar
nicely flight and turn outside off, JP watches it go to the keeper
that's a beauty! He tosses it up and beats JP with the flight and turn as he drives, MSD whips the bails off but he's safe
pitched up and JP sweeps it on the full to fine leg for two in the gap
outside off again with turn, left alone easily
bit too full outside off, pushed softly into the covers for a quick single
goes back in the crease and helps the ball with the turn to midwicket
JP sees the flatter ball and defends off the back foot
stays back again and pushes it down to long on for one
outside off with some room and Faf punches it to sweeper cover for one
doesn't move much and defends the length ball back
makes it turn towards middle and he helps it with the turn to midwicket
goes in the crease and pushes it to midwicket again
Faf nearly goes off balance while trying to push it off the back foot and sends it to fine leg
outside off with the turn, pushed easily into the covers
turning in from off, Faf waits for it and works it to backward square leg
comes down this time and flicks with the wrists just wide of midwicket
goes for the sweep and connects from outside off, as Bhuvi runs to his left and keeps it to one
pitched up on middle, rolls his wrists over it to find deep midwicket
outside off and he drives it with the turn through the covers
goes back for the shorter ball and clips to midwicket where the fielder dives to his left and the ball deflects off for one
JP presses forward now and pushes it square on off for one more
pushes the length delivery outside off towards the covers
waits for it in the crease and cuts it square to deep point for one
some drift and turn towards leg and it deflects off the pads
comes down the track and drives to long-on for one
edge flies and falls wide of cover! JP drove at it off the font foot and the turning ball got the outside edge in the air but wide of the diving fielder
turning in from outside off and it's cut off the back foot to sweeper cover
comes down and pushes the full delivery to long on for one more
turning towards middle stump, Faf doesn't move much and blocks it back
swing and a miss, the crowd "Oooohs"! There was some room outside off, JP went for the drive but the ball went past the inside edge and kept low a little
back of length now not too far from off and he defends off the back foot
even shorter now at 134kph, tucked to deep midwicket for one
angling in from outside off, Faf waits and opens the face of the bat late to guide it to point
comes down a step and drives the ball nicely to mid-off for one
just around length and angling towards the stumps, JP defends it back
Fa comes down a step and pushes the ball down the ground for one
outside off and it's pushed square off the wicket

stays on the back foot and he punches it so well through the covers, that's pierced the gap! Rohit covered a long way to his right in the deep and threw the ball while diving to his partner, but Umesh missed it and it went for four
JP waits for it to turn and pushes it down to long on for one
fullish outside off and it's driven to cover
short ball and JP pivots on the back foot to pull it straight to deep midwicket
back of length outside off and it's punched through the gap, Faf does it so easily. But Axar puts in a dive, or a slide, and cuts the ball in for three
angled towards the pads, it deflects off the pads to fine leg for one
just a hint of room outside off and it's punched down to mid-off for a quick single. Faf took off for that immediately
slower ball at 116kph outside off, just short of length, and JP defends it to cover point
tossed up just outside off and Faf scoop-sweeps it fine of short fine leg for one
JP likes to sweep it too, and does it fine just like Faf but without the scoop and gets two
on the leg stump now, poor delivery and JP sweeps easily again, pretty fine for two before Mohit cuts it off
touch shorter outside off, he waits and pushes it down to long on
just a bit of room, it's enough for Faf and he drives it so well through the off side for four to bring up the 100
towards the leg side now and it's clipped to square leg
good length outside off, JP expertly opens the face and guides the ball through cover for one
hit-me delivery that and du Plessis obliged but have to hit the gap too. Du Plessis hung back and punched the ball to cover
a bit short but too straight, du Plessis turns the ball to fine leg for an easy single
slower offcutter on leg side, JP gets some glove or thigh pad on it and the ball rolls towards fine leg
dispatched from his presence. What a shot that is. Top quality. Not all that short but Faf rocks back and pulls the ball through midwicket for four. Superlative timing
good length again on and around off, pushed to point off the back foot
nicely tossed up on leg stump, easily driven to long-on
good use of the feet, gets to the pitch, smothers the spin and drills to long-on
too full and JP gets a good stride forward before driving to long-on
short and cut away through cover
overpitched on off, patted back to the bowler
excellent playing of spin here, although Raina isn't turning it that much. Faf gets to the pitch and hits the man at long-on with another on-drive
short ball attempted but Faf is in exemplary form, gets back and flat-bats the pull between midwicket and mid-on. No stopping this guy
back of a length on middle, worked off his hips effortlessly through square leg
ooh, inside-edged past the stumps for four. A bit lucky for JP who looks to drive but the ball takes the edge and goes to fine leg
short and wide, JP misses his cut and is beaten outside off
slower delivery outside off, on a fifth-stump line. Patted tamely to point
139.8 ks, easy for JP. Too short from Yadav and Duminy rocks back and smashes the pull through deep square leg. Rolled his wrists on that and kept it down
shorter on off, little bit of turn. Faf makes room and drives the ball past cover. They think of two but decide against it
good batting. Slower through the air outside off, JP plays it with soft hands towards point and they scamper through
nurdled off his pads to deep square leg
flatter and quicker outside off, JP stays back and punches back to the bowler
use of the feet now but Axar drags that back and JP is hit on the pads as it rolls to midwicket

got im this time. Duminy gets down early and looks to hard sweep this but he misses and is struck on the pads. But was that outside the line? Not sure. Maybe not. Umpire Vineet Kulkarni is quick to raise his finger though. Struck him in front that. Good decision
pushed to point off the back foot
good length again, Faf cuts to cover off the back foot
keeps low that. Dragged his length back a touch, Faf looks to play off the back foot but the ball keeps low as he tries to play through the off side
and this one climbs on Faf. Lots of bounce. Outside off and Faf looks to steer but the ball goes past his edge
super placement. Full and Faf leans on the drive and finds the gap through cover for four. Great shot

out with a direct hit. Too full again on off, Faf hits it nicely to mid-off and sets off for a run. But there is no run there. The fielder picks up and hurls in a throw at the non-strikers end but doesn't hit the stumps.
91 ks, flat on off, skids on to Faf who brings his bat down late to drive back to the bowler
much fuller and squirted out back to the bowler
too full and pushed to long-off for a single
tossed up outside off, AB opens the face and drives through point for one
a bit full here but Faf hits the man at cover

this one goes straight to Kohli at cover. Great catch. Faf wanted to go over that man at cover but doesn't get under it enough. He hits it uppishly where Kohli jumps and holds onto a good catch. Massive wicket of the anchor
good length on off, worked off his pads to fine leg

and Miller is gone! First delivery. Miller has to walk back. Another big wicket for India. Miller fishes at that and gets an edge through to Dhoni. First-ball duck. Excellent lines from Bhuvneshwar. Dhoni takes a good diving catch too. SA in trouble now.
fullish length now outside off, Behardien pushes the ball to cover
great stuff from BK. Probing lines on off, Behardien pushes at the ball from the crease with no feet movement. Drives to cover
fuller again and driven into the off side
edged, but falls short. Excellent lines these and Behardien drives at that with no feet movement and gets a thin edge which falls just short of Dhoni
tossed up on off, driven to cover, Kohli fumbles the ball allowing the single
flat on middle and off, FB presents the full face of the bat as he defends
worked off his legs towards square leg
nicely played. Goes straight on with the arm on off and middle, AB opens the face to find the gap through cover
tickled off his pads to fine leg. Just the single
beautiful cricket. Nicely flighted on off and middle, AB makes a touch of room to open up the drive to long-off with the full face of the bat
opens the face and gets the ball through cover for a single
good length on off, excellent lines. Defended into the off side
yet Behardien steals the single, he pushes the fuller delivery to mid-on and sets off for a quick single. Makes it without a dive
short and wide and Ab crashes the ball to that man, he times it so well that there is no run
extremely tight lines this. Zoning in on off, AB blocks with a full face of the bat
full on a fourth-stump line, AB pats the ball to point off the back foot
flighted on off, calmly blocked from Behardien
solidly gets behind the line and defends
Axar gets too straight this time and turns the ball to square leg for one
again he opens the face of the bat and drives through point
good batting this. Opens the face and finds the gap through cover with the spin.
blocked out to cover off the front foot
excellent shot, no worries for AB as he just clips the ball through midwicket. No problem for this man. Too straight from BK. His first bad ball in quite a while
full and wide, AB flays at that and chops it back towards cover
133.7 ks, fuller length on off which is met with a solid block off the front foot
extremely watchful in defense is AB. Blocks this off the front foot
and what about that? That is just unbelievable. He steps down and launches a full delivery over mid-off. He just timed that and it went well over the boundary.
slower spin from Harbhajan, pushed back to the bowler
worked with the spin towards deep square leg
slightly quicker through the air. AB hangs in his crease and works the ball to deep square for a single
a bit short and slow. Enough time for FB to hang back and work he ball to square leg
nicely bowled. Tossed up on off but not too full, AB respectfully drives back
some more flight but not lots of turn. AB drives with the spin to long-on

they have got the big man out. AB goes. Not a great shot, to be honest. Hits the ball in the air but too close to Kohli at cover. What a big wicket that is. Fuller length outside off, AB stays back and flat-bats the drive and Kohli dives low to his left and takes a good tumbling catch. Match-changing stuff from Virat.
drifts down leg, called wide
good length on off, solidly blocked off the front foot to mid-on
too full but Steyn can only drive to cover
half-volley on off, Steyn smears a drive to cover
thick outside edge flies down to third man. Good length again
too straight from Mohit. Behardien works the ball towards fine leg and he races across for the second. Good running
slightly quick through the air outside off, the ball squirts off the inside half towards midwicket
creamed! Tossed up outside off and Steyn gets down early and slog-sweeps this well over the midwicket boundary. Huge six but more importantly, six for SA
excellent delivery.  Flatter through the air and goes straight on, Steyn gets a thick outside edge which flies past Raina at slip. Four more for SA
flatter again on middle, enough time for Steyn to stay back and work to short leg
and flat again towards middle, pushed to midwicket
too quick on leg, Steyn nudges the ball to midwicket.
terrific shot that. Delectable on-drive. Just leans on the shot past the stumps but mid-on gets around and keeps it to one even with a misfield
drags his length back. Good length on off, blocked!
beautifully played again. Fuller length and driven past the bowler but mid-on cuts the ball in
tight lines on off. Patted to point
too short from Mohit. Good length on middle and leg and FB calmly tucks the ball to square leg. No trouble at all.
132 kph, bouncer, well-directed bouncer! Steyn gets under that and lets it go. Good variation that
slower through the air but too short, nudged off the back foot to square leg
leg side-ish now and tickled down to deep fine leg for a single
yes for the moment. Flat and quick, Steyn stands back and punches back
much fuller but not much flight on that, Steyn drives to long-on with the spin
excellent work off his own bowling. Pushed towards long-on but Harbhajan gets across and puts in a diving stop
slower again through the air on middle, FB looks for that gap at long-on but cannot find it

gone, first ball. Poor shot from Steyn. Splice-jarring length from Yadav and Steyn looks to play that over cover, not the ball to play that shot to. It hits high on the bat and lobs up to Kohli at cover who takes a good running catch this time.
thick edge first ball for Rabada. Too thick and it goes past a third-gully position to third man
Behardien keeps his cool at the other end. Clips a ball off his pads to deep square leg
fullish length on middle. Importantly, it is straight but KR gets behind the line and plays the ball to mid-on
nice bowling. Pushed across the left-hander asking him to drive and Rabada cannot help himself, he goes after it but the ball goes through
141 ks, fullish outside off, driven to mid-off. There is a single but Behardien decides against it.
excellent start. Probing line on off, defended to point
slower delivery on middle, tickled off his pads to square leg
crashed through cover. Three slips in place and Mohit puts the ball outside the off stump, inviting a drive. Rabada smashes it
ah, no feet movement on that occasion. And the ball goes past the outside edge
131 ks, on off and middle, tapped towards mid-on for a quick single
easy single to long-on. Good length and Behardien just calmly pushes the ball there to keep strike
bit of room outside off, FB plays it late on the off side wide of third man in the gap for two
goes on his toes this time for the angling delivery and tucks it to deep midwicket for one
back of length outside off, Rabada pushes it into the covers. Kept a little low that one
right on the stumps this time, Rabada defends to midwicket this time
back of length on the pads, tucked off the hips to deep square leg
short of length around off, defends it to leg straight to mid-on
outside off and it's pushed into the covers
fuller around off and it's pushed to Harbhajan's right, he dives to stop but can't stop. He's disappointed

appeal for caught behind mainly from Dhoni, Vineet Kulkarni has given it after some time! Harbhajan did not appeal that hard after turning it down leg, not sure what the ball clipped on the way but Dhoni appealed and got the reward. no pad for sure. Replays and snicko show there was no bat either!
starts to Tahir with a wide down leg, Tahir won't complain
towards middle and leg and Tahir defends it back
tossed up, Tahir goes down on a knee for the slog sweep, there's a fielder in the deep but it's a big sweep for six
outside the off stump and it's pushed just wide of point for one
back of length around off and Tahir defends on the off side
some room outside off now, Tahir chops it late to third man for one

short of length outside off, pushed into the covers and there's a fumble from a sliding Rohit and he concedes a single. I think Kohli threw the ball to non-striker's end after that and missed the stumps. Rabada jumped over the ball despite crossing the crease, but had the ball hit the stumps, he was out!
length delivery on off, pushed into the covers
Tahir sees room and drives without moving his feet, and misses
some width outside off and it's pushed towards cover point
just short of length but not much room, pushed to cover
swings and misses this time with a drive outside off
shorter on middle and leg, tucked towards midwicket for a quick single
Tahir gets room outside off and he flays it off the back foot between point and cover point for one
on the pads now and it's tucked away easily wide of midwicket for one
not too wide outside off and the drive is mistimed a bit to find cover
short of length outside off and Rabada swings and misses
on the pads from Umesh and it's tucked to midwicket
slightly short and wide outside off, Rabada takes a tiny step forward and slashes that over the covers and in the gap for four
length delivery around off and he turns it to mid-on. Tahir wants one but is sent back just in time
too short on the leg side, Rabada pulls it late and gets some glove on that to send it fine on the leg side for four more!
on length on the stumps now, he defends it back easily
Tahir tries to cut it outside off and gets an inside edge close to the stumps and it goes to Dhoni

outside edge this time, there was a sound and this time it goes to Dhoni, he leaps and throws the ball high! It wasn't too wide outside off, Tahir pushed at it without moving his feet and got a faint edge
just short of length and MM punches it down the ground, Dhawan dives to his left from mid-off but can't get to it. That's four!

edged again, taken with both hands by Raina at slip, India have won, Indore erupts! There was some room outside off and MM wanted to force it through the off side. He got a thick edge and Raina caught it over his head at slip
